Inter Font Directory
====================

This directory is reserved for Inter font files.

When self-hosting the Inter font, place the following files here:
- Inter-Light.woff2
- Inter-Regular.woff2
- Inter-Medium.woff2
- Inter-SemiBold.woff2
- Inter-Bold.woff2
- inter.css (font-face definitions)

Currently using Google Fonts CDN for Inter font.
